In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

Director: Brad Peyton
Writers: Carlton Cuse (screenplay), Andre Fabrizio (story)
Stars: Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, Alexandra Daddario 
Genres: Action | Drama | Thriller
Country: USA
Language: English


San.Andreas.2015.CAM.HQ-Mic.XVID.AC3.Hive-CM8

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time

Sources:

Video: Russian/Spanish Cam
Audio: HQMic CherryBomb Big Thanks m8

Notes:

had the spanish cam since yesterday, cam itself was ok for first cam, looks similar to the first avenger cam that was out
had slight movement here and there nothing unusual, needed perspective and tilting
While i was trying to fix the video, the russian had already fixed everything, except the flicker, it looked nice
so thx to the russian, saved me hours of work

Encode:

took the russian video, fixed colours, brightness,contrast and removed flickering, the rest seemed just fine

got that nice cam audio from CherryBomb, thx again
audio was straight and clear, you can understand everything thats said,effects are also nice and balanced
ran it through my usual cleaning process and started syncing
it was a pita i can tell you that, took me 6h but its all lipsync now

video was complete, audio was full, nothing was cut out, its all there from start till beginning of endcredits

got very nice
will do me till either web-dl hits or rental, but i doubt this will happen within the next 3 weeks
till than it will do just fine

enjoy
